description.value:
The Intellectual Student is typically the most studious one. Excelling in school is as natural to them as breathing, walking, or designing atmospheric processing plants in their dreams! These things typically make them a favorite of teachers and highly sought after by other students who struggle with their homework.

Restriction: Must start the game with at least 12 Intelligence

Student Abilities:

  • Characteristic Points: +2 to Intelligence, +1 to Any Other

  • Starting Skills: Investigation, STEM, Medicine

  • Prodigy: @UUID[Compendium.mka.studenttypes.i5VdfoOVOYHBZjYO]{Prodigy} You may use Inspiration and, as a Free Action, your next Intelligence Skill Check result becomes 20+Mod. You may only use this ability during a Non-Combat Encounter and it can used after dice are rolled.
